description:
In this presentation, we will discuss the concepts & techniques we used to modernize TalentLMS, a very successful monolithic system.


Transforming a tightly coupled system into a loosely coupled one can be a very complex and challenging process - many have tried and failed! Our approach is one of incremental improvements and continuous quality, with a DDD-inspired Anti-Corruption Layer at its core.
title: Breaking down the monolith - Embracing new opportunities
